repliclust.base¶

Base classes for data generators, blueprints, mixture models, and related objects.

Functions

get_supported_distributions()

Print the names of currently supported probability distributions, as well as their default parameters.

set_seed(seed)

Set a programwide seed for repliclust.

Classes

Blueprint(n_clusters, dim[, n_samples, ...])

Base class for a blueprint.

ClusterCenterSampler()

Base class for sampling the locations of all cluster centers in a mixture model.

CovarianceSampler()

Base class for sampling covariances (principal axes and their lengths) of all clusters in a mixture model.

DataGenerator(blueprint[, n_datasets, prefix])

Base class for a data generator.

DistributionMix()

Base class for assigning probability distributions to clusters in a mixture model.

GroupSizeSampler()

Base class for sampling group sizes (the number of data points in each cluster) for all clusters in a data set.

MixtureModel(centers, axes_list, ...)

Base class for a probabilistic mixture model.

SingleClusterDistribution(**params)

Base class for specifying the probability distribution of a single cluster in a mixture model.

repliclust
